segments.text: I notice the woman’s apron is getting wet from the overflowing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s still polishing that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to slip on that wet floor any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading, and she’s not even looking down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange scene—so much is happening, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
